name: EAGLE User Language Program
summary: A ULP file is a program created to extend the functionality of Autodesk EAGLE, a printed circuit board (PCB) design program. It contains code written in EAGLE's C-like User Programming Language, as well as metadata that describes the program's function and author. You can open and edit a ULP file's text in any text editor, and you can run the program the file contains in EAGLE's Schematic Editor or Layout Editor.
